tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_profiles_preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    ar_experience_enabled BOOL,
    ar_theme VARCHAR(50),
    ar_preferences JSON
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
  user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  full_name VARCHAR(100),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ar_preferences (
  preference_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
  ar_theme VARCHAR(50),
  ar_color_scheme VARCHAR(50),
  ar_sound_enabled BOOLEAN,
  ar_notifications_enabled BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE ar_experiences (
  experience_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
  experience_name VARCHAR(100),
  experience_description TEXT,
  experience_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
   user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
   age INT,
   location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
   preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
   theme VARCHAR(50),
   language VARCHAR(50), 
   notifications BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE ar_experiences (
   experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
   experience_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
   rating FLOAT,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ar_devices (
   device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
   device_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
   os_version VARCHAR(50),
   status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
   user_id INT,
   experience_id INT,
   preference_level INT,
   PRIMARY KEY (user_id, experience_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (experience_id) REFERENCES ar_experiences(experience_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_activities (
   activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT,
   experience_id INT,
   activity_date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (experience_id) REFERENCES ar_experiences(experience_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_reviews (
   review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT,
   experience_id INT,
   review_text TEXT,
   rating INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (experience_id) REFERENCES ar_experiences(experience_id)
);
